FuncDef:
The vlan instance command displays a VLAN instance view in which mappings between MSTIs and VLANs are configured.
The undo vlan instance command restores the configured mappings between MSTIs and VLANs. The vlan instance command displays a VLAN instance view in which mappings between MSTIs and VLANs are configured. The undo vlan instance command restores the configured mappings between MSTIs and VLANs. By default, all VLANs in an MST region are mapped to MSTI 0.
ExtraInfo: Mappings between instances and VLANs need to be configured on a network running a Layer 2 ring protocol. Before configuring such mappings, run the vlan instance command to display the VLAN instance view. This command applies to all ring protocols, facilitating configurations.
